summary: A young girl requests the help of a vampire hunter to kill the vampire who has bitten her, and thus prevent her from becoming a vampire herself.
cast: Kaneto Shiozawa|Michie Tomizawa|Seizô Katô|Satoko Kifuji|Kazuyuki Sogabe|Motomu Kiyokawa|Yûsaku Yara|Kazuko Yanaga|Yoshiko Sakakibara|Keiko Toda|Yasuo Muramatsu|Kan Tokumaru|Ichirô Nagai|Kazumi Tanaka|Shinya Ôtaki|Michael McConnohie|Barbara Goodson|Jeff Winkless|Edie Mirman|Kerrigan Mahan|Steve Kramer|Steve Bulen|Joyce Kurtz|Lara Cody|Tom Wyner|Kirk Thornton|Luci Christian|Shannon Emerick|Tiffany Grant|John Gremillion|Jay Hickman|Mark Laskowski|George Manley|Andy McAvin|John Swasey|David Wald
title: Vampire Hunter: Cazador De Espíritus
